item.description:
Hello Canadian Music Fans,

The Tragically Hip have a new album coming out this fall (October 2) and that means they'll be playing in Boston. They are playing at the House of Blues in the fenway area on Friday November 9. We'll most likely meetup before the show for dinner and drinks at the Lansdowne Pub. I would advise if you are interested in coming to get a ticket through ticketmaster at Tickets

Â 

Cheers,

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be meeting before the show at the Bleacher Bar.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Tragically Hip in Boston... up close and personal!
